Room.Name: Lankshire Parkway
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Lankshire Parkway, just west of the funeral home.
Room.LongDescription: The Nevermore Funeral Services office is located to the east and provides all sorts of services for the recently deceased. It is conveniently located on the northwestern corner of the Necropolis to provide easy access to the burial, cremation and embalming services provided by the Necropolis. Lankshire Parkway continues to the north and south, intersecting with Netherland Lane to the north.
